mapper.select: select org_flow,count(*) as in_count , min(IN_DATE) as min_in_date,max(IN_DATE) as max_in_date from PDSCI.PUB_PATIENT where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and patient_type_id='Real' and record_status='Y' and in_date is not null group by org_flow

select * from PDSCI.PUB_PATIENT a where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and org_flow=#{orgFlow} and patient_type_id='Real' and record_status='Y'
and in_date is not null
and patient_flow in(select patient_flow from PDSCI.edc_random_rec where patient_flow = a.patient_flow and drug_group=#{groupName} and record_status='Y') order by patient_seq

select * from PDSCI.PUB_PATIENT a where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and org_flow=#{orgFlow} and patient_type_id='Real' and record_status='Y' and in_date is not null and patient_flow in(select patient_flow from PDSCI.edc_random_rec where patient_flow = a.patient_flow and drug_group=#{groupName} and record_status='Y') order by patient_seq
